title: Ticket #2491: schedd crash after failed $$ expansion
description:
There is a problem when $$ substitution fails. This causes the job to go on hold. In 7.7.1, this causes an immediate search for a new job to run on the claim associated with the held job (#1314). If no job is found, the claim is relinquished. When we eventually pop up the stack to the caller of GetJobAd(), this dereferences the deleted match rec, which causes the schedd to crash.

All callers of GetJobAd() with the "expand $$ macros" option set to true must therefore be prepared for the match rec to be deleted.
